      • triPoints

        public static java.awt.Polygon triPoints(java.awt.Rectangle rect,
                                         Direction orientation)
        Returns the Polygon for a triangle in the middle of the provided rect, pointing in the orientation (given as angle from upwards, or orientation vector)
        Parameters:
        rect - rectangle with the location
        orientation - orientation of the sprite.
        Returns:
        a polygon (triangle) with the specified orientation.

      • noise

        public static double noise(double input,
                           double epsilon,
                           double random)
        Adds a small noise to the input value.
        Parameters:
        input - value to be altered
        epsilon - relative amount the input will be altered
        random - random variable in range [0,1]
        Returns:
        epsilon-random-altered input value

      • readGames

        public static java.lang.String[][] readGames(java.lang.String filename)
        Processes a file with game names (containing full path). Assumes that the input is csv, with each line with the format: N, fullPath Where N is the index and fullPath the full path to the file, including extension (.txt).
